authError.common: Unauthorized action, this has been logged

API.ACHIEVEMENT_NOT_FOUND: The action mentioned a non-existing achievement
API.CURRENT_USER_NOT_IN_SUBMITTERS: You cannot perform this action on a request that you are not a part of
API.DEMONSTRATION_NOT_FOUND: The action mentioned a non-existing demonstration
API.ENROLMENT_NOT_FOUND: The action is accessing a user's enrolment(s) and found none -- maybe a teacher was accidentally handled as a student?
API.HELPREQUEST_EXPIRED: An expired help request cannot be claimed or marked done
API.HELPREQUEST_NOT_FOUND: Trying to claim/mark-as-done/cancel a non-existing help request
API.HELPREQUEST_NOT_PICKED_UP: A help request that is not picked up cannot be marked done
API.INVALID_CURRENT_USER: Internal error: the current user's identifier did not match any record on file
API.STUDENTS_MAY_NOT_CLAIM_DEMONSTRATION: A student may not claim a demonstration
API.USER_IN_MULTIPLE_HELP_REQUEST: One of the selected users is already on the list
API.USER_NOT_CURRENTLY_ENROLLED: At least one student in the current action is not enrolled in the current course instance
API.USER_IN_MULTIPLE_DEMO_REQUEST: One of the selected users is already active in another demonstration
API.USER_NOT_FOUND: The action mentioned a non-existing user
API.JWT_MISSING_FROM_REQUEST_HEADERS: The JWT token is malformed or missing
API.A_DEMONSTRATION_REQUEST_MUST_CONTAIN_AT_: A request to demonstrate must contain at least one achievement
API.DEMONSTRATION_ALREADY_GRADED: The demonstration has already been graded
API.DEMONSTRATION_DONE_DOES_NOT_MATCH_REQUES: Result contains students or achievements that were not in the request being graded
API.HELPREQUEST_CANNOT_MARK_BY_STUDENT_NOT_I: Deprecated after role-based security is merged
API.STUDENTS_MAY_NOT_CLAIM_OR_UNCLAIM_DEMONS: Deprecated after role-based security is merged
API.STUDENT_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_PERFORM_THAT_ACTI: Deprecated after role-based security is merged
API.DEMONSTRATION_CONTAINED_NON_DEMONSTRATAB: Internal error: the demonstration contains an achievement that cannot be passed through demonstration.
API.JWT_TOKEN_EXPIRED: The JWT token has expired, please log in again
API.GRADING_REQUIRES_VERIFIED_PROFILE_PIC: All students need a verified profile picture
